title: whats going on?
body:
when i login the beta client it somehow shows the login screen with the top bar of things we can click on (play shop collection exc)
I don't know whats going on can someone help me with this?

replies.body: That sounds pretty messed up....could you shoot me a picture of how it looks when it's messed up so that I can see exactly what's going on?
i would but i don't know how to send pictures on this other then emojis they have :<

Any image links ending in .jpg or .png should show up when you link it in a comment. I personally prefer to use [Gyazo](https://gyazo.com/captures) but some other people like using things like Imgur instead.

Image Link : https://gyazo.com/b7d68a3d14c5e0f73283be9d79b7ee82 
and thanks for tip for pictures

Yeeeeaaaaa that looks a little strange that's for sure. I noticed that your client is still in the process of patching, and because of that the files probably aren't all updated quite right yet. Let's wait for that patch to finish up, then login and see if that fixes everything.
its like that because i thought reinstalling might help but ok i will try what ur saying

https://gyazo.com/6af6ec30577bfe41631e0d9dc92b0f14
its done i try clicking on it didnt work then i close it then reopen it again

**Hrrrrrrrmmmmmm.** Your client is definitely having some really weird problems. It's not the best route to take since you had just updated finally, but your client might have some corruption within it's files for some reason. At this point I'd suggest grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running it with the reinstall/clean uninstall options to make sure you've got a fresh working copy of League installed.
i tryed and did the repair tool but when i close and open the client again its still the same

Honestly, this is really bugging me as well xD. Let's get you a little more in-depth help from our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They can dig much deeper than I can here on the boards, so you'll be in much better hands there!
ok and thanks and i just now notice u work for riot 030
